Approach is the combination of gradually increasing learning rate (to optimal learning rate as per https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.01186 by same author

citation.excerpt: PyTorch implementation of One cycle policy as described in Leslie Smith's paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1803.09820.

description.excerpt: Verify initial implementation as mentioned in heder of this doc it is wip
Integrate weight decay parameter, as paper sugests it needs to be constant through out of this training.
